org.rdkit.knime.types

Interface RDKitTypeConversionErrorProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RDKitTypeConverter

    public interface RDKitTypeConversionErrorProvider
    This interface gets implemented by type converters that support that listeners can be attached to be informed about conversion errors.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTypeConversionErrorListener(RDKitTypeConversionErrorListener l)
      Adds a type conversion error listener which will be informed about each conversion error that occurs.
      InputDataInfo getInputDataInfo()
      Returns information about the column that is subject of conversion.
      void removeTypeConversionErrorListener(RDKitTypeConversionErrorListener l)
      Removes the specified type conversion error listener from the list of listeners If the listener is not found in the list, this method is not doing anything.
      void setInputDataInfo(InputDataInfo inputDataInfo)
      Attaches information about the input column that is subject of conversion.

    • Method Detail

      • setInputDataInfo

        void setInputDataInfo(InputDataInfo inputDataInfo)
        Attaches information about the input column that is subject of conversion. It is used when informing listeners about errors.
        Parameters:
        inputDataInfo - Input data info. Can be null.

      • getInputDataInfo

        InputDataInfo getInputDataInfo()
        Returns information about the column that is subject of conversion. It is used when informing listeners about errors.
        Returns:
        Input data info. Can be null.

      • addTypeConversionErrorListener

        void addTypeConversionErrorListener(RDKitTypeConversionErrorListener l)
        Adds a type conversion error listener which will be informed about each conversion error that occurs. If the listener was already added before, this method will not add the listener again.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to be added. Can be null to do nothing.

      • removeTypeConversionErrorListener

        void removeTypeConversionErrorListener(RDKitTypeConversionErrorListener l)
        Removes the specified type conversion error listener from the list of listeners If the listener is not found in the list, this method is not doing anything.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to be removed. Can be null to do nothing.
